Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $1200000. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1100000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this significant opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
